data.title: Joaquin Phoenix's Girlfriend And Dating History
data.meta_description: Joaquin Phoenix's girlfriend and his dating history have always been the center of attention for fans and celebrity news enthusiasts. The award-winning actor, ...
data.text:
Joaquin Phoenix and Rooney Mara started dating in 2016, after meeting on the set of Mary Magdalene, and made their red carpet debut at the Cannes Film Festival in May 2017. Later that year, Phoenix revealed that he and the Carol actress had moved in together.

Phoenix and Mara got engaged in July 2019, after three years of dating.

Page Six reported in May 2020, that Phoenix and Mara were expecting their first child together, and the following September the child was born. People reported that they named their firstborn, a baby boy, "River." This in order to honor Phoenix's late brother.

Rooney Mara is an accomplished American actress, known for her stellar performances in critically acclaimed films such as The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo, Carol, and The Social Network. Born into a prominent football family, Rooney chose a different path and made a name for herself in Hollywood with her intense, uncompromising portrayals of complex characters. Her accolades include an Academy Award nomination for Best Actress, a Cannes Film Festival Best Actress award, and a BAFTA Rising Star Award nomination.

In 2005, Joaquin Phoenix and Ginnifer Goodwin became an item after meeting on the set of their film Walk the Line. Their whirlwind romance was short-lived but undeniably passionate, with the pair showcasing their undeniable chemistry at several public events. However, they eventually decided to part ways amicably, with Ginnifer going on to marry actor Josh Dallas, while Joaquin continued to search for the one.

Ginnifer Goodwin is an American actress best known for her role as Mary Margaret Blanchard/Snow White in the popular television series Once Upon a Time and her starring role in the romantic comedy-drama He's Just Not That Into You. With a career spanning both television and film, Ginnifer has also lent her voice to animated characters, such as Judy Hopps in the Disney hit Zootopia. Her captivating performances and charm have earned her much love and respect in the entertainment industry.

After being introduced by mutual friends, Joaquin Phoenix and Topaz Pagegreene's connection grew stronger, culminating in a six-month relationship in 2005. The duo shared an affinity for veganism and animal rights activism, which became a significant aspect of their bond. Although their romance was relatively short, it left a lasting impression on both individuals, and they continued to remain friends even after parting ways as a couple.

Topaz Pagegreene is an American model and environmentalist who has used her platform to raise awareness about veganism and sustainable living. With a passion for animal welfare and conservation, Topaz has collaborated with various environmental organizations and campaigns to make a positive impact. Known for her ethereal beauty and unique sense of style, she has graced the covers of numerous magazines and walked the runway for a myriad of high-profile designers.

Back in 2001, Joaquin Phoenix embarked on a short-lived romance with Norwegian model Lisa Ebeltoft, after meeting at a fashion show in New York City. Despite their seemingly passionate relationship, they ultimately decided to call it quits after only a few months of dating. Their separation was amicable, and both parties moved on with their lives and continued to achieve success in their respective careers.

Lisa Ebeltoft is a stunning Norwegian model known for her work in the fashion industry during the late 90s and early 2000s. With her striking features and statuesque figure, Lisa has graced the pages of numerous fashion magazines and walked the runway for several renowned designers. Although she has largely stepped away from the limelight in recent years, her undeniable beauty and success as a model will forever be etched in the annals of fashion history.

Joaquin Phoenix and Anna Paquin shared a brief romantic encounter during the late 90s when they were still relatively new to Hollywood. Although their relationship was short-lived and relatively low-key, they both continued to make waves in the entertainment industry. They have since moved on to other relationships, with Anna marrying her True Blood co-star Stephen Moyer, while Joaquin has settled down with Rooney Mara.

Anna Paquin is a New Zealand-Canadian actress who first gained attention for her Academy Award-winning performance in Jane Campion's The Piano at the age of 11. She has since starred in notable roles in the X-Men film series as Rogue and as Sookie Stackhouse in the HBO series True Blood. Over the course of her career, Anna has earned numerous accolades, including a Golden Globe Award and a Primetime Emmy Award nomination, solidifying her as a talented and versatile actress.

In 2000, Joaquin Phoenix and British actress Amelia Warner sparked a brief romance, which quickly captivated fans and media alike. However, their relationship only lasted a few months before they decided to part ways amicably. Their respective careers continued to flourish, with Amelia later marrying Fifty Shades of Grey actor Jamie Dornan, while Joaquin found love with Rooney Mara.

Amelia Warner is an English actress and composer, best known for her roles in films such as Quills, Mansfield Park, and Aeon Flux. In addition to her acting prowess, Amelia has also made a name for herself in the world of music, composing scores for several feature films under the moniker Slow Moving Millie. Her multifaceted talents and artistic endeavors have established her as a force to be reckoned with in the entertainment industry.
